overview:
William (Bill) Rice is an Associate at Cue Ball. Bill brings a passion for entrepreneurship and technology as well as a quantitative skill set grounded in analytics and metrics. He provides strategic and operational support to Cue Ball portfolio companies and also holds responsibilities in the areas of investment sourcing, due diligence, and general fund administration.

Background Bill was previously an analyst at First Step, a microfinance fund located in Ireland, where he performed due? diligence on prospective entrepreneurs, assisted with fundraising, and targeted deal flow expansion options. Prior to working at First Step, Bill started his career in R&D at PepsiCo. Bill is a three year graduate of Boston University where he earned a BA in Economics with Honors.

Education Boston University, B.A. with Honors
